title: Anand_Bhatt_-_Achieving_Your_Dreams_by_Controlling_Your_Mind_The
description:
Published: Nov 15, 2014
Publisher: Harper Collins
Language: English
PDF


With an introduction and epilogue from Swami Vivekananda, Hollywood's Anand Bhatt tells it to us straight. This is not "The Secret" - it's a practical primer on getting exactly what you want out of life inclusive of useful exercises and tips.

Anand Bhatt give us a step by step guide on how to correctly achieve our dreams. Mysticism Debunked! This is a practical and usable guide for accessing the power of your mind in a foolproof, entertaining, and exciting way to accomplish your goals.

Packed full of research, intelligence, fun stories, and case studies! This book provides the best method for getting over the feeling of "pushing a boulder up a hill" or getting ahead when you feel you're not getting anywhere. Regardless of what your goal is, you will find this book both useful and entertaining
